id.comment: Finds all procedures that calls another procedure

query.querystr: procedure p, q; Select p such that Calls(p, q)

id.comment: Finds all procedures that calls another procedure Transitively

query.querystr: procedure p, q; Select p such that Calls*(p, "Last")

id.comment: Finds all procedures that calls another procedure with wild card

query.querystr: procedure p; Select p such that Calls(p, _)

id.comment: Finds all procedures that calls another procedure with wild card Transitively

query.querystr: procedure p; Select p such that Calls*(p, _)

id.comment: Finds all procedures that calls Last

query.querystr: procedure p; Select p such that Calls(p, "Last")

id.comment: Finds if it is true that a procedure that calls Last

query.querystr: procedure p; Select p such that Calls(_, "Last")

id.comment: Finds if it is true that a procedure that calls Last

query.querystr: procedure p; Select p such that Calls("Finalize", "Last")

id.comment: Finds if it is true that a procedure that calls Last

query.querystr: procedure p; Select p such that Calls("Last", "Finalize")

id.comment: Finds if it is true that a procedure that calls Last

query.querystr: procedure p; Select p such that Calls("Last", _)

id.comment: Finds which while statement uses variable

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w ("x", _)

id.comment: Finds which while statement uses variable

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w ("y", _)

id.comment: Finds which if statement uses variable

query.querystr: if if; Select if pattern if ("x", _, _)

id.comment: Finds which if statement uses variable

query.querystr: if if; Select if pattern if ("i", _, _)
